title: How do some players attain their ranking?
body: I just don't quite understand how someone that goes 0/8/0 in 20 minutes can possibly be even remotely be near the skill level of others in the game. I've defended the system before, but seeing people like this on a regular basis, where games are decided by who gets the 0/6/0 Teemo on their team, makes it hard to have faith in the accuracy or legitimacy of any ranking below diamond 1 or master/challenger tier.
